text: 12.43 2 Ko 8.12 Jisas anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, bɨne okok kɨlop agek apelak agak, Nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agak. Binɨb mani kuŋay mɨdeb okok, mani kɨli ogɨnap sek dap God nop ñɨbal agak. Pen bin kaŋɨl awl, mani ne won omɨŋal mɨdeb anep dap ñub agak. Ne tap taw ñɨŋɨnɨmuŋ olap ma mɨdeb agak. Anɨb ak God nɨgek, binɨb ogɨnap sɨkol ñɨbal, bin kaŋɨl ak awl yɨbɨl ñub agak.
